metadata.title: CVE-2022-48956 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ipv6: avoid use-after-free in ip6_fragment()Blamed commit claimed rcu_read_lock() was held by ip6_fragment() callers.It seems to not
